name: Drop-in: Chess Club
description: Come match wits with an opponent in the most strategic of board games: Chess. This program is a collaboration with the Glen Park Library, and both sites will take turns hosting. Glen Park Rec Center will host the second and fourth Thursdays of every month.
fullDescription: Come match wits with an opponent in the most strategic of board games: Chess. This program is a collaboration with the Glen Park Library, and both sites will take turns hosting. Glen Park Rec Center will host the second and fourth Thursdays of every month.
whatTheyOffer: Come match wits with an opponent in the most strategic of board games: Chess. This program is a collaboration with the Glen Park Library, and both sites will take turns hosting. Glen Park Rec Center will host the second and fourth Thursdays of every month.
howToGetIt: If this is a Drop-In program, please go to the meeting location at the activity start time.
